about.subtitle: The ecosystem of food delivery and not only (flowers, shops, pharmacies)

slide1.title: How the app works
slide1.1: The customers places an order on your website or in the application
slide1.2: Order information sent to the institution
slide1.3: The organization confirms the order and begins to collect it
slide1.4: The system selects the best option for the nearest courier

5.2: Courier picks up the collected order

slide1.6: We collect feedback and encourage new orders

7.2: Courier passes the order to the customers
